Title: SharePhone
Description:
Windows Phone 7 library for connecting to SharePoint 2007/2010.

Lets you work with SPWeb, SPList, reading/writing strong typed list items, user profiles, etc
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Windows Phone 7 library for connecting to SharePoint 2007/2010.

Lets you work with SPWeb, SPList, reading/writing strong typed list items, user profiles, etc
